issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Base UI > Views > Image Views > Basic
3. Tap on where the titanium logo usually loads

Actual Result:
The titanium logo is not loaded, and when you click the area it do not shows the cloud image as well.

Expected Result:
To load the titanium logo and when you click the area, the cloud image loads

On android 2.2.6 and 4.0.2, its showing behavior as per TIMOB-3679.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchen Sink: The basic image does not load, and when you click the cloud image also do not loads
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120418121806
Tested with Titanium  Studio: 2.0.2.201205011723
Android 3.2: Samsung Tab
Machine OS : Windows 7

comments.body: @sbhadauria - Is this a platform or kitchensink issue? Did you run this test with a previous release? Did you run this test with iOS platform? You need to provide sufficient information with these tickets.

Not able to reproduce this issue with 
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120510174631 , 2.0.2.v20120418121806 and 1.8.2.
Tested with Titanium  Studio: 2.0.2.201205091504 on Windows 7 machine.
Its now behaving as per TIMOB-3479. Hence we can close this bug.
Closing this ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
